DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects admin events, such as changes and updates, from all Barracuda devices. Recommend using this connector along with the BarracudaWebAppFW and BarracudaWeb connectors.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: 32, ServiceInfo: VIEW MESSAGE LOG DETAIL; VIEW QUEUE MESSAGE DETAIL
FastPattern.pattern: web: \[[\d.]+\] (?:VIEW MESSAGE LOG DETAIL|VIEW QUEUE MESSAGE DETAIL)
